languages.text: "Спасение — следствие Его неизмеримой милости к верным делу Его, а не плод заключенных тобой сделок. Император не торгуется".
"Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."
languages.original_text: "Спасение — следствие Его неизмеримой милости к верным делу Его, а не плод заключенных тобой сделок. Император не торгуется".

traits.locale_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

languages.text: “救赎是帝皇对虔信之人施以的仁慈，不是什么交易带来的结果。帝皇从不做交易。”
languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

traits.locale_text: “救赎是帝皇对虔信之人施以的仁慈，不是什么交易带来的结果。帝皇从不做交易。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ne devons notre salut qu'à Sa miséricorde envers ceux qui Lui sont fidèles, et pas à un quelconque marché. L'Empereur ne conclut pas de marchés. »
languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne devons notre salut qu'à Sa miséricorde envers ceux qui Lui sont fidèles, et pas à un quelconque marché. L'Empereur ne conclut pas de marchés. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La salvación es consecuencia de su infinita misericordia con los fieles a su causa y no de ningún trato. El Emperador no negocia».
languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

traits.locale_text: «La salvación es consecuencia de su infinita misericordia con los fieles a su causa y no de ningún trato. El Emperador no negocia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「救済は、彼の大義に忠実な信徒に計り知れぬ慈悲をかけてくださった結果だ。契約関係の成果ではない…皇帝は取引をなさらぬ」
languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

traits.locale_text: 「救済は、彼の大義に忠実な信徒に計り知れぬ慈悲をかけてくださった結果だ。契約関係の成果ではない…皇帝は取引をなさらぬ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Erlösung ist die Konsequenz seiner unermesslichen Gnade den treuen Anhängern seiner Sache gegenüber, nicht die Frucht eines Handels — der Imperator geht keine Handel ein."
languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

traits.locale_text: "Erlösung ist die Konsequenz seiner unermesslichen Gnade den treuen Anhängern seiner Sache gegenüber, nicht die Frucht eines Handels — der Imperator geht keine Handel ein."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

languages.text: "Kurtuluş; pazarlık meyvesi değil, O'nun kendi davasına sadık olanlara gösterdiği sınırsız merhametin bir sonucudur. İmparator anlaşma yapmaz."
languages.original_text: "Salvation is the consequence of His immeasurable mercy to those faithful to His cause, not the fruit of any bargain — the Emperor does not strike deals."

traits.locale_text: "Kurtuluş, O'nun kendi davasına sadık olanlara gösterdiği sınırsız merhametin bir sonucudur, pazarlığın meyvesi değildir. İmparator anlaşma yapmaz."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
